```{r setup, include=FALSE}

```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
# set the state list for choices
states = ufo %>% distinct(city) %>% pull()  
# selectInput widget (dropdown menu)
selectInput(
  "state_choice", 
  label = h3("Select state"),
  choices = states, selected = "NY")

# set the city list for choices
cities = ufo %>% 
  filter(state == input$state_choice) %>% 
  distinct(city) %>% 
  pull()
```

### Chart A

renderPrint({
  input[["state_choice"]]
})
